title: FRIDAY 5/28 - QB NEWS FROM OTAs
itunes:title: FRIDAY 5/28 - QB NEWS FROM OTAs
description:
Bill Belichick (0:07) talks about the work Cam Newton is putting in. Sean McVay (0:54) has liked what he's seen from his new QB Matthew Stafford. Todd Gurley (1:51) visits Stafford's old team. Daniel Jones (2:06) looks to make a big jump in year 3. Alex Smith (3:00) has some harsh words for the Packers and their handling of the Aaron Rodgers situation. Robert Saleh (3:37) says Zach Wilson has been "relentless"...and Drew Lock (3:55) seeks the advice from a Broncos legend

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
